text: Yuriy Illich Prylypko (, 11 August 1960 â€“ 7 March 2022) was a Ukrainian politician. He was the mayor of Hostomel from 2015 until 2022. Prylypko was born in Hostomel, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. Prylypko was killed on 7 March 2022 while delivering food and medicine in Hostomel after he was shot by Russian soldiers at age 61. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ukrainian mayors Category:Murders by firearm Category:2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine
title: Yuriy Prylypko
